basics.label: Director of Business Development
basics.summary: A senior executive with a broad array of skills and expertise in business development, marketing, sales, account management and market research. Experienced in increasing income and market share, brand building, discovering new opportunities in mature markets, managing accounts, client service and leading teams.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Developed and implemented growth initiatives in various different environments and cities. Notable accomplishments include developing relationships and securing priority status leading to substantial growth, redesigning business development programs, increasing business more than double and revamping the format of monthly meetings leading to increased attendance.
highlights: Increased income 112% in 12 months in Austin
Increased market share from 20% to 70% in downtown Atlanta construction market in 12 months
Designed and executed branding plan to change the image of the organization

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Director of Business Development/Political Relations Director
work.summary: Covered North Carolina, South Carolina and Georgia where I focused on growing market share leveraging client, political, and end-user relationships. Also served as a Political Director endorsing and aiding in successful campaign runs.
highlights: Growing the market share by 90% in the three states, with growth over 100% in Atlanta alone
Leveraged relationships to secure work at projects for companies and gained introductions to the executives of other end-users to provide even more bid opportunities
Endorsed and assisted in successful election campaigns

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Started under my father's guidance and later developed skills in sales and management while running local Firestone Automotive and Tire Stores and Transworld Systems, an accounts receivables solutions company.

courses: How to Communicate with Diplomacy and Tact

skills.name: Business Development
keywords: Various CRM software products including Salesforce, Salespoint, ZOHO, and Outlook
